title: Apple Reacts to Samsung’s Transparent TV
description:
Samsung and LG just invented transparent TVs so that you can fully immerse yourself in the wall behind your favourite shows!

Samsung Transparent TV: https://youtu.be/zuw0Qr8DHuA?si=RXRtLmqK9EcucS6h
Original LG Transparent TV Ad https://youtu.be/2BZy3OJeAbs?si=MOZw0fM0Veq6mhqA
